item.description:
HAPPY HOUR TIME! With The Ira.

Filled with fun, stimulating conversation, meeting new folks, and enjoying the Happy Hour Food and Drink Specials. Celebrate the last Thursday of the month, and Celebrate Life!!!!!!!!

When: Thursday March 26 2009. 5:00PM-?
Back of Bar Area 5.00 Martinis Wine By the glass 5.00 Half price on Bar Menu 5-7


Where: The Mill on the River, 989 Ellington Road, South Windsor, CT





Please- RSVP ASAP, so I know how many tables to secure.


Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792- mistrchrming@aol.com

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Celebrate Life!!!! Happy Hour!!!!! at The Mill on the River!!!!!
